div.p: J.L.Dodds
Co #8-23rd Engrs
A.E.F.
Miss Ellen Smith
111 Hatton Street
Jackson
Tennessee
U.S.A.
SauillyFrance
Dear Ellen:
I have received two letters from you in the last week and was awful glad to hear from you once more. Had about decided you had forgotten me.
I have been most sick with cold for a week But feel better now am glad to say I hope you are fine and dandy
I am sure I would feel good if I could get out of this country where it doesnt rain so murch.
Well I had a visitor the other day and who do you thank it was Linn. I was working and when I came in for dinner
he was waiting for me I sure was glad to see the old boy. I dont believe I would have known him if had met he out on the road he is so fat doesnt look like Linn of old times.
I will bet you will say the same thing when you see him. He said he had ask everybody that he thought would know where I was and no one seemed to know.
I had done the same thing about him. He just happened to ask one of the boys in my Company and they brought him up to my barricks.
He is in a small town about 6 miles from here
I thank he is going to try and get back to this town where I am so we can be together Part of his Company is here now and he can come back if he wants to.
I sure wish he would, you cant amagine how good it makes a fellow feel to see some one he knew back home.
I bet Ernest Barnes was glad to get back to the little city once more. But he wont have to bet any for I sure wont to get back
I dont have any idea when will be but I hope wont be long. I guess maybe I will be ther by July 4,
We had a boxing bout here
last saturday night. Was 23 Engir against the 79 Div the 23 won to of the bouts and the 79 won one.
One of the boys that fought belongs to my Company and he is pretty good.
We are going to have a negro minstral show to night Some time we are having. But I had rather be home.
I would have liked to have been there so we could have gone to MulOBriens Minstral
Have the Elk put on there show this winter? and was it any good?
I thank some one wrote me that they were going to have a show or had already
had it I dont remember which. Well I dont know any more news so will quit for this time.
Write me real often for I always enjoy your letters
With lots of love
James L Dodds
Truck Co #8-23 Engir
American Exp. Force
Via N Y, France
